testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables

testcase.system-out: Given User is on Greencart landing page.....................................passed When User search for Brinjal vegetable......................................passed And Added items to cart.....................................................passed And User proceeded to Checkout page for purcharse...........................passed Then Verify selected Brinjal items are displayed in Checkout page...........passed
